channel.title: Client Help PloX!
channel.description: Hi I've got a problem that when i run my client and i log in to my server. I can click 1 time but the second time i click the client closed automatic. I hope somebody can help me! Gratz~.! Masterthom

item.title: Client Help PloX!
item.dc:creator: @dvdnext dvdnext
item.description:
@dvdnext wrote:

[quote=“Masterthom, post:1, topic:293881”]Hi
I’ve got a problem that when i run my client and i log in to my server.
I can click 1 time but the second time i click the client closed automatic.
I hope somebody can help me!
Gratz~.!
Masterthom[/quote]
i had that problem to but… i found out what the problem was
i had a source and client that wont let me login with OWNER in my nickname
maby thats ure problem to, srry i dont now how to fixit i just took an other client
